name: Magma Tsunami
description: Magma Tsunami is a frenzied arcade platformer game. Beat your records in 1P or Co-op mode, and don't get caught by the Magma Tsunami!!! Could you stay alive for more than one minute??
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work. Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Very good game, loads of fun

A very bare-bones 2D runner game with okay platforming.   I wouldn't say its worth money - be it full price or pennies - since you could easily find numerous amounts of games like these online for free that have an Upgrade system, achievements and additional gameplay elements.
Really fun to play. Worth the money.

Played this for cards, not expecting much, but wow...i got much worse than i expected.  This game is basicly a crappy endless runner, that would get repetitive fast. There are much better mobile runners FOR FREE. I dont think i would even recommend this game even if it was free. You are running away from a badly animated magma wave, with a badly modeled character. Thats it. No unlockables. No achievements. Just the same randomised runs. I played this for 5 mins and i already got bored. I got this as a freebie, so i don't feel so bad about getting this. But you probably shouldn't buy it. Go play canabalt. A much better game.  1/10  EDIT: If you still wanna buy the game, you should know that, you start on a small window and there arent any resolution options in the game.

Horrible controls on PC. There are 3 buttons you need to press, run, jump and sprint. The combination is almost non-intuitive on keyboard (V or left mouse button to jump, i hope I remember them correctly, I've played under 10 mins) and the game requires cat like reflexes, because the obstacles and enemies comes way to fast, even on training on the lowest level of dificulty.
